import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useHistory, useParams, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, Checkbox, Upload } from 'antd' import '../styles/Form.css' import axios from 'axios' const initialState = { first_name: '', last_name: '', email: '', contact_number: '', dob: '', disability: '', disease_type: '', gender: '', location: '', street_address: '', city: '', state: '', zip_code: '', country: '', } function Member() { const [states, setState] = useState(intialState) const { first_name, last_name, email, contact_number, dob, disability, disease_type, gender, location, street_address, city, state, zip_code, country, } = states const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() } const handleInputChange = (e) => { const {name, value} = e.target; } return (

) } export default Member
